api.error.generic.heading.description: The error message displayed when an API request fails for an unknown reason and an error message was provided by the server.

api.error.other.message.defaultMessage: An unknown error occurred. Please try again.
api.error.other.message.description: The error message displayed when an API request fails for an unknown reason and no code or message was found.

api.error.otherWithCode.message.defaultMessage: The server returned an unexpected resonse ({code}). Please try again.
api.error.otherWithCode.message.description: The error message displayed when an API request fails for an unknown reason and an error code was provided by the server.

api.error.otherWithMessage.message.description: The error message displayed when an API request fails for an unknown reason and an error message was provided by the server.

api.error.parsingError.message.defaultMessage: Error parsing server response ({error}). Please try again.
api.error.parsingError.message.description: The error message displayed when an API request fails because the response was not in the expected format.

api.error.requestFailure.message.defaultMessage: Unexpected client error ({error}). Please try again.
api.error.requestFailure.message.description: The error message displayed when an API request fails because the request failed to be sent.

auth.flowError.redirecting.message.defaultMessage: {reason, select, session_refresh_required {Reauthentication required. } browser_location_change_required {} session_aal2_required {2FA required. } other {}}Redirecting...
auth.flowError.redirecting.message.description: The message shown when an authentication flow requires a redirect (for example, an action requires an additional security step like a 2FA verification)

auth.flowRestarted.message.defaultMessage: The form had to be reloaded{reason, select, security_csrf_violation { because the security token expired.} security_identity_mismatch { because your session changed} self_service_flow_expired { because the form expired} self_service_flow_return_to_forbidden { because the return URL is invalid} other {}}. Please try again.
auth.flowRestarted.message.description: The message telling the user that the form they submitted had to be reloaded (perhaps because too much time has passed since the form was generated and a security token has expired)

auth.loggedInAlreadyNotice.messageWithUs.description: The message telling the user that they are already logged and they have a username which can be used as part of the message

auth.loggedInAlreadyNotice.messageWithou.description: The message telling the user that they are already logged but there is no username which can be used as part of the message

auth.login.signUpInstead.message.defaultMessage: Don't have an account yet? <link>Sign up!</link>
auth.login.signUpInstead.message.description: The message shown on the login page that directs the user to create an account instead of logging in.

auth.loginForm.2fa.heading.description: The heading text displayed at the top of the login form when requesting the user's 2FA code

auth.loginForm.confirmAccess.heading.description: The heading text displayed at the top of the login form when the user is already logged in but we need them to enter their password again to reconfirm their access

auth.loginForm.login.heading.description: The heading text displayed at the top of the login form when logging in

auth.loginLink.text.description: The text for the link that the user can click to log in

auth.logoutButton.text.description: The text for the link that the user can click to log out

auth.passwordInput.togglePasswordVisibil.description: The tooltip text shown when hovering over the button that toggles the visibility of the users password.

auth.recovery.heading.description: The title displayed at the top of the password recovery form

auth.recoveryLink.text.description: The text displayed for a link that takes you to the account recovery page

auth.registration.alreadyHaveAccount.mes.description: The message shown on the registration form that direct the user to the log in page if they already have an account

auth.registration.heading.description: The title displayed at the top of the registration form

auth.registrationForm.oidcDivider.text.description: The text displayed in the divider that separates the registration form from addditional OIDC registration options

auth.registrationLink.text.description: The text for the link that will take the user to the new user registration form

auth.selfServiceUi.emailNode.label.description: The label for the email input on the user profile or registration page.

auth.selfServiceUi.localeSelectNode.defa.description: The option for selecting the default locale based on the users location in the locale selection dropdown box of the user's profile/registration form

auth.selfServiceUi.localeSelectNode.usag.defaultMessage: This will be used for external communications or when we can't automatically detect your locale based on your device settings. To change the current application language visit the <preferencesLink>preferences page</preferencesLink>.
auth.selfServiceUi.localeSelectNode.usag.description: A message explaining that the user's locale field of their profile is used for sending external communication and in cases where a device isn't available to provide a locale.

auth.selfServiceUi.passwordNode.label.description: The label for the passowrd input shown in forms.

auth.selfServiceUi.profilePictureNode.de.description: The text shown on the button used for removing the current profile photo.

auth.selfServiceUi.profilePictureNode.up.description: The text shown on the button used for uploading a new profile photo.

auth.sessionsList.title.description: The text shown as the heading for the list of user's active session

auth.sessionsTable.authenticatedAt.colum.description: The heading text for the column showing the last used time and date for a session

auth.sessionsTable.currentSessionIndicat.description: The tooltip/helper text shown when indicating that a particular session is the current session the user is authenticated with

auth.sessionsTable.expiresAt.columnHeadi.description: The heading text for the column showing when a session expires.

auth.sessionsTable.method.columnHeading.description: The heading text for the column showing the authentication method used for a session.

auth.settings.changePasswordSection.head.description: The heading displayed at the top of the change password section of the settings form

auth.settings.oidcSection.heading.description: The heading displayed at the top of the change password section of the settings form

auth.settings.profileSection.heading.description: The heading displayed at the top of the profile section of the settings form

auth.settings.totpSection.heading.description: The heading displayed at the top of the change password section of the settings form

auth.settings.totpSection.toggleButton.a.description: The accessible text for button that shows and hides the two-factor authentication settings section

auth.settings.webauthnSection.heading.description: The heading displayed at the top of the change password section of the settings form

auth.settings.webauthnSection.toggleButt.defaultMessage: Toggle Hardware Tokens and Biometrics settings
auth.settings.webauthnSection.toggleButt.description: The accessible text for button that shows and hides the hardware token and biometrics settings section

auth.verification.heading.description: The heading text displayed at the top of the verification form

common.dataTable.sortHeader.ariaLabel.defaultMessage: {sort, select, asc {Sorted ascending} desc {Sorted descending} other {Not sorted}}
common.dataTable.sortHeader.ariaLabel.description: The accessible text to show for the sort indicator in the table header

common.hompageButton.text.description: The text to display on the button used to direct the user to the home page

common.loadingSpinner.ariaLabel.description: The accessible text to show for the spinning loading indicator

contactUs.form.emailField.label.description: The label to display for the email field of the Contact Us form

contactUs.form.emailField.placeholder.description: The placeholder text to display when the email field of the Contact Us form is empty

contactUs.form.messageField.label.description: The label to display for the message field of the Contact Us form

contactUs.form.messageField.placeholder.description: The placeholder text to display when the message field of the Contact Us form is empty

contactUs.page.heading.description: The text to show as the heading of the Contact Us page.

contactUs.page.instructions.defaultMessage: Email us at <mailto>{emailAddress}</mailto> or fill out the form below for any feedback, questions, problems, or feature requests.
contactUs.page.instructions.description: The instructions displayed at the top of the Contact Us page directing the user to send an email or fill at a form.

contactUs.page.title.description: The page title for the Contact Us page.

contactUs.success.message.defaultMessage: Thanks for your message. We'll get back to you soon.
contactUs.success.message.description: The text shown after submitting the Contact Us form successfully

contactUs.success.title.description: The title to display above the text shown after submitting the Contact Us form successfully

errors.errorAlert.message.description: The message to show when an unknown error has occured.

errors.errorAlert.retryButton.text.description: The text to show on the retry button that may be available when an error has occured.

errors.notFoundPage.errorCode.description: Additional text on the error page that indicates this is a '404' error code

errors.notFoundPage.title.description: The title shown in the browser tab/window for the not found page

faq.page.title.description: The page title for the FAQ page.
